metadata.title: CVE-2018-14394 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
libavformat/movenc.c in FFmpeg before 4.0.2 allows attackers to cause adenial of service (application crash caused by a divide-by-zero error) witha user crafted Waveform audio file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14394` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:2.8.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libav-tools - 7:2.8.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libavcodec-extra - 7:2.8.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libavcodec-ffmpeg-extra56 - 7:2.8.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libavcodec-ffmpeg56 - 7:2.8.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libavdevice-ffmpeg56 - 7:2.8.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libavfilter-ffmpeg5 - 7:2.8.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libavformat-ffmpeg56 - 7:2.8.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libavresample-ffmpeg2 - 7:2.8.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libavutil-ffmpeg54 - 7:2.8.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libpostproc-ffmpeg53 - 7:2.8.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libswresample-ffmpeg1 - 7:2.8.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libswscale-ffmpeg3 - 7:2.8.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7:2.8.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
